desc: A state of the art bicycle store in the heart of the Southern Suburbs, Cape Town, South Africa. We offer one of the finest bicycle workshop's in South Africa and service all brands of bicycles. A proud Specialized Concept Store since 2014 and Specialized Retailer of the year for 2017, 2018 and 2019.

layout.text:
Our industry leading E-bikes are back in stock. Be sure to stop by the store to let our staff take you through the entire range.
We even have demo bikes!
